channel.title: Beyasian on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Beyasian on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: test a new post
item.description: 假设一个二项分布事件，要求估计出参数theta drive = c('texting','texting','texting','not','not', 'texting','texting','not','not','texting') # convert to numeric, arbitrarily picking texting=1, not=0 driveNum = ifelse(drive=='texting', 1, 0) N = length(drive) # sample size nTexting = sum(drive=='texting') # number of drivers texting nNot = sum(drive=='not') # number of those not 我们武断设置一系
